description: A collection of McCarverisms that anyone can enjoy (and add to!)

mccarverisms.quote: I think Tim Wakefield would even say tonight that Tim Wakefield got to Tim Wakefield tonight.
Darren Daulton used his glove like a mitt, there.
A matchup between A-Rod and K-Rod could be called "Rod-Rod"
I just said Pandoval. I combined Sandoval and Panda. I think I should coin that.
Catch it before it hits the ground.
It's a five letter word, S-T-R-I-K-E.
And it's Hunter Pence's job to RECEIVE the seeds.
<a href="http://youtu.be/3kVSh8Kwwbo">Exit light, enter night, take my hand, we're off to never never land.... Not bad.<\a>
